headline: Growing company with naming rights to CT arena to expand operations near venue. Here’s what’s next.
summary: PeoplesBank, which recently acquired the naming rights to downtown Hartford’s sports and entertainment arena, will expand its operations into downtown Hartford early next year, opening new office space and a branch at the CityPlace II office tower. The expansion, across from PeoplesBank Arena, accompanied an announcement that PeoplesBank’s chief executive Tom Senecal, who joined the Holyoke, ...
